text:
We want to make a sync between our HubSpot and central phone office to get Client name from HubSpot based on phone no and I have 2 questions please:
- cam we create an HTTP endpoint in HubSpot that will take requests from the central telephone office, search the caller's database based on the phone number received and return his identity?
Â - Does Hubsport have a static IP address? how can I make it ti accept connections from <http://my.smartpbx.ro|my.smartpbx.ro> (86.104.176.50), is it possible?
Documentation for workflow extensions (now called custom automation actions) is available <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|here>

Hey all! I was wondering if HubSpot API supports pulling ad activity where I can see budget spend, ad performance, and even use HubSpot's attribution model to show which contacts converted to customers in our BI tool?
